statements: SELECT * FROM funding_sources;
SELECT source_name, amount FROM funding_sources WHERE start_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT funding_id, source_name, amount FROM funding_sources WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM funding_sources ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT funding_id, source_name FROM funding_sources WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM funding_sources WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT source_name, amount FROM funding_sources WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT funding_id, source_name, amount FROM funding_sources ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM funding_sources WHERE source_name LIKE '%Donation%' AND amount < 5000;
SELECT funding_id, source_name, start_date, end_date, amount FROM funding_sources WHERE amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects WHERE funding_source_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT project_name, start_date, funding_source_id FROM projects WHERE funding_source_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM projects;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE funding_source_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, funding_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM projects INNER JOIN funding_sources ON projects.funding_source_id = funding_sources.funding_source_id;
SELECT project_name, funding_name, contact_email FROM projects INNER JOIN funding_sources ON projects.funding_source_id = funding_sources.funding_source_id WHERE funding_name LIKE '%grant%';
SELECT * FROM funding_sources;
SELECT id, name, type FROM funding_sources WHERE type = 'Grant';
SELECT id, amount FROM funding_sources WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, title, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, name, type, amount FROM funding_sources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT p.title, f.amount, s.name FROM projects p JOIN project_funding f ON p.id = f.project_id JOIN funding_sources s ON f.source_id = s.id WHERE f.amount >= 10000;
SELECT id, title, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT s.name, SUM(pf.amount) AS total_amount FROM funding_sources s JOIN project_funding pf ON s.id = pf.source_id GROUP BY s.name HAVING total_amount > 50000;
SELECT * FROM funding_sources;
SELECT name, description FROM funding_sources WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT project_id, funding_id, amount_allocated FROM project_funding ORDER BY amount_allocated DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT project_id, status, last_updated FROM project_status WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM funding_sources WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY name DESC

SELECT projects.name, project_funding.amount_allocated, funding_sources.name FROM projects INNER JOIN project_funding ON projects.id = project_funding.project_id INNER JOIN funding_sources ON project_funding.funding_id = funding_sources.id

SELECT projects.name, funding_sources.name, project_funding.amount_allocated FROM projects LEFT JOIN project_funding ON projects.id = project_funding.project_id LEFT JOIN funding_sources ON project_funding.funding_id = funding_sources.id WHERE projects.start_date > '2022-01-01'

SELECT projects.name, project_status.status, project_status.last_updated FROM projects INNER JOIN project_status ON projects.id = project_status.project_id WHERE project_status.last_updated < '2022-08-01'

SELECT projects.name, project_funding.amount_allocated, funding_sources.amount FROM projects INNER JOIN project_funding ON projects.id = project_funding.project_id INNER JOIN funding_sources ON project_funding.funding_id = funding_sources.id WHERE funding_sources.amount > project_funding.amount_allocated
SELECT * FROM funding_sources
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects
SELECT project_id, partner_name FROM project_partners
SELECT project_id, source_id, amount FROM project_funding ORDER BY project_id DESC
SELECT project_id, update_date, update_description FROM project_updates WHERE project_id = 2
SELECT * FROM funding_sources;
SELECT source_name, amount FROM funding_sources WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, partner_name FROM projects JOIN project_partners ON projects.project_id = project_partners.project_id;

SELECT projects.project_name, project_updates.update_date, project_updates.update_description FROM projects JOIN project_updates ON projects.project_id = project_updates.project_id WHERE project_updates.update_date >= '2022-01-01';
